001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Board;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Ship;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Shot;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.GameViewModel;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.subjects.BehaviorSubject;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.subjects.Subject;
015import java.util.List;
016import javax.inject.Inject;
017import retrofit2.http.PUT;
018
019/**
020 * Links the {@link ViewModel} and the {@link JataServiceProxy} that talks to the server. Its
021 * methods are invoked by the view model, then they invoke code that sends the relevant Json packet
022 * to the server.
023 */
024public class JataRepository {
025
026  private static final String TAG = JataRepository.class.getSimpleName();
027
028  private final JataServiceProxy proxy;
029  private final JataLongPollServiceProxy longPollProxy;
030  private final UserRepository userRepository;
031  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
032  private final Scheduler scheduler;
033  private Subject<Game> gamePoller;
034  private Subject<Throwable> throwablePoller;
035  private CompositeDisposable pending;
036  private Game game;
037  private Board board;
038  private Shot shot;
039
040  @Inject
041  JataRepository(JataServiceProxy proxy, JataLongPollServiceProxy longPollProxy,
042      UserRepository userRepository,
043      GoogleSignInService signInService) {
044    this.proxy = proxy;
045    this.longPollProxy = longPollProxy;
046    this.userRepository = userRepository;
047    this.signInService = signInService;
048    scheduler = Schedulers.single();
049    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Authenticates a user, invokes the {@link JataServiceProxy#startGame(Game, String)} to send an
054   * HTTP request to the server, and then begins listening for the long poll responses from the
055   * server, and then processes the response from the server.
056   *
057   * @param game A {@link Game} object to be sent to the server.
058   */
059  public void startGame(Game game) {
060    signInService
061        .refreshBearerToken()
062        .observeOn(scheduler)
063        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.startGame(game, token))
064        .doOnSuccess(this::setGame)
065        .subscribe(
066            this::updateGame,
067            this::updateThrowable,
068            pending
069        );
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Authenticates a user, invokes the {@link JataServiceProxy#submitShips(String, List, String)}
074   * method to send an HTTP request to the server, and then listens for the long poll responses from
075   * the server, and then processes the response from the server.
076   *
077   * @param ships {@link List} of {@link Ship} objects that will be sent to the server.
078   */
079  public void submitShips(List<Ship> ships) {
080    signInService
081        .refreshBearerToken()
082        .observeOn(scheduler)
083        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.submitShips(game.getKey(), ships, token))
084        .subscribe(
085            this::updateGame,
086            this::updateThrowable,
087            pending
088        );
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Authenticates a user, invokes {@link JataServiceProxy#submitShots(String, List, String)} to
093   * send an HTTP request to the server, listens for the long poll responses from the server, and
094   * then processes the response from the server.
095   *
096   * @param shots {@link List} of {@link Shot} object(s) that is being sent to the server.
097   */
098  public void submitShots(List<Shot> shots) {
099    signInService
100        .refreshBearerToken()
101        .observeOn(scheduler)
102        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.submitShots(game.getKey(), shots, token))
103        .subscribe(
104            this::updateGame,
105            this::updateThrowable,
106            pending
107        );
108
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Processes the long poll responses from the server holding a {@link Game} object.
113   *
114   * @return Reactive stream of the {@link Game} object that can be subscribed to.
115   */
116  public Observable<Game> pollGameStatus() {
117    if (gamePoller != null) {
118      gamePoller.onComplete();
119    }
120    gamePoller = BehaviorSubject.create();
121    //noinspection ResultOfMethodCallIgnored
122    return gamePoller
123        .subscribeOn(scheduler)
124        .flatMapSingle((game) -> userRepository.getCurrent()
125            .doOnSuccess((user) -> game.getBoards().forEach(Board::isMine))
126            .map((user) -> game)
127        )
128        .doOnNext((game) -> {
129          if (game.isStarted() && !game.isFinished() && !game.isYourTurn()) {
130            getGame(game.getKey());
131          }
132        });
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Processes long poll responses throwing an exception.
137   *
138   * @return Reactive stream of a {@link Throwable} that can be subscribed to.
139   */
140  public Observable<Throwable> pollThrowable() {
141    if (throwablePoller != null) {
142      throwablePoller.onComplete();
143    }
144    throwablePoller = BehaviorSubject.create();
145    return throwablePoller
146        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Stops long polling when invoked.
151   */
152  public void stopPolling() {
153    gamePoller.onComplete();
154    throwablePoller.onComplete();
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * Check the validity or placement of a ship, and updates the {@link List} of {@link Ship} objects
159   * if the placement is valid or throws an exception and reverts the {@link List} of {@link Ship}
160   * to its last valid formation.
161   *
162   * @param ships @link List} of {@link Ship} that was last validated successfully.
163   * @param boardIndex The board position in every {@link Game} object's {@link List} of
164   * {@link Board}
165   */
166  public void changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex) {
167    if (isPlacementValid(ships)) {
168      List<Ship> boardShips = game.getBoards().get(boardIndex).getShips();
169      boardShips.clear();
170      boardShips.addAll(ships);
171    } else {
172      throwablePoller.onNext(new InvalidShipPlacementException());
173    }
174    gamePoller.onNext(game);
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * Checks the validity of the placement of the move or rotation of a ship, and rotates the ship 90
179   * degrees if the move or rotation and invokes {@link JataRepository#changePlacement(List, int)}
180   * to validate again if the rotation would not end in a valid move.
181   *
182   * @param ships      {@link List} of {@link Ship} that was last validated successfully.
183   * @param boardIndex The board position in every {@link Game} object's {@link List} of
184   * {@link Board}
185   * @param ship The {@link Ship} object that was moved or rotated by the user.
186   */
187  public void changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex, Ship ship) {
188    if (isPlacementValid(ships)) {
189      List<Ship> boardShips = game.getBoards().get(boardIndex).getShips();
190      boardShips.clear();
191      boardShips.addAll(ships);
192    } else {
193      ship.setVertical(!ship.isVertical());
194      changePlacement(ships, boardIndex);
195    }
196    gamePoller.onNext(game);
197  }
198
199  /**
200   * Validates the placement of ships when a user moves a ship on their board before submitting
201   * their ships.
202   *
203   * @param ships {@link List} of ships as they have been currently placed on the board.
204   * @return Boolean flag indicating whether ship placement is valid.
205   */
206  public boolean isPlacementValid(List<Ship> ships) {
207    int size = game.getBoardSize();
208    boolean[][] placement = new boolean[size][size];
209    boolean valid = true;
210    outer:
211    for (Ship ship : ships) {
212      int x = ship.getX();
213      int y = ship.getY();
214      int length = ship.getLength();
215      boolean vertical = ship.isVertical();
216      if (x < 1 || y < 1
217          || (vertical && y + length > size + 1)
218          || (!vertical && x + length > size + 1)) {
219        valid = false;
220        break outer;
221      }
222      int stepX = vertical ? 0 : 1;
223      int stepY = vertical ? 1 : 0;
224      for (
225          int checkY = y - 1, checkX = x - 1, step = 0;
226          step < length;
227          checkY += stepY, checkX += stepX, step++
228      ) {
229        if (placement[checkY][checkX]) {
230          valid = false;
231          break outer;
232        }
233        placement[checkY][checkX] = true;
234      }
235    }
236    return valid;
237  }
238
239  private void getGame(String key) {
240    signInService
241        .refreshBearerToken()
242        .observeOn(scheduler)
243        .flatMap((token) -> longPollProxy.getGame(key, token))
244        .doOnSuccess(this::setGame)
245        .subscribe(
246            this::updateGame,
247            this::updateThrowable,
248            pending
249        );
250  }
251
252  private void updateGame(Game game) {
253    if (gamePoller != null) {
254      gamePoller.onNext(game);
255    }
256  }
257
258  private void updateThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
259    if (throwablePoller != null) {
260      throwablePoller.onNext(throwable);
261    }
262  }
263
264  private void setGame(Game game) {
265    this.game = game;
266  }
267
268  /**
269   * Defines custom exception thrown by {@link JataRepository#changePlacement(List, int)} when a
270   * user moves or rotates their ship into an invalid position.
271   */
272  public static class InvalidShipPlacementException extends IllegalArgumentException {
273
274    public InvalidShipPlacementException() {
275      super();
276    }
277
278    public InvalidShipPlacementException(String message) {
279      super(message);
280    }
281
282    public InvalidShipPlacementException(String message, Throwable cause) {
283      super(message, cause);
284    }
285
286    public InvalidShipPlacementException(Throwable cause) {
287      super(cause);
288    }
289  }
290
291}
